text:
Hey all! Does anyone know how to set the created date for a blog post when using the ‘Create a new blog post’ endpoint?? I have tried setting the publish_date but the created date is still displaying as the date I did the import. I have lots of old blog posts to import and they need to keep the original dates. Many thanks!

*Edit: It turns out you can pass created as a parameter, it is just not in the documentation*

`Error: Exception while calling underlying service. This is not peano's fault.`

I’ve been getting the above error over the last couple of days while fetching contacts from the new `/crm/v3/objects/contacts` endpoint.  Has anyone else been seeing this and is there anything I should be doing differently on my end to avoid it?

I want to do a search for “companies where X property has been updated in the last Y days”. I can get property history with the old companies API, and parse that, but .. anyone have any smarter ideas?

The only easy way I know of to solve that is by creating a new property that will save the date of the last time the main property was updated (you can subscribe to this using a webhook, or do it with a workflow) and then use v3 search API to check that property.
